title: Traditional, vegan, nutrichondriac... which Christmas lunch tribe will you choose in 2019?
text:
Oh, the weather outside is frightful. Actually I’ll start that again. Oh, absolutely everything is frightful, but never fear, because here’s a thought to warm the cockles of even the most miserable doom-mongers: ten weeks tomorrow, we’ll all be tucking into Christmas lunch.

So what will be on the menu in your household this year? You might be a staunch traditionalist, in which case your answer is probably, “What we’ve been eating on the December 25 since before you were born, young man. We as a nation are about to regain our sovereignty – don’t you dare darken my door with the suggestion we have to give up our pigs in blankets.”

To which I would say: calm down, Roger, no one is making a grab...
description: Oh, the weather outside is frightful.
